dataList.content: It's been so long since I visited one of these haunted mansions... The last time I was at a place like this, I thought when the next time came I'd be here with my family again. Not... all on my own like this...
All on your own? C'mon, kiddo... You're here with your coworkers~
Ahm. Coworkers who are... kinda like family, innit?
Enough chit-chat. Everyone, direct your attention to the floor. There's something there.
... Yes, there are numerous signs of battle. Just as I expected.
A stench, this miasma of rot fills my lungs... it has been some time since the battle took place.
... No body here appears to be a Fixer who participated in our ongoing mission.
... Or maybe they've all been turned into Bloodbags and are shambling through the haunted mansion... but it's probably better to not share that kind of thought here.
<There's blood everywhere...>
Tzzzt... zzzt...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: I welcome you all with all my heart, dear guests, to Haunted: Bloody Mary.
The portrait from which the voice was echoing from was torn in half.
From what we could deduce from the remaining part of the portrait, it was likely a depiction of the king of this castle... or at least, that was the story it tried to convey.
... It's all torn up.
It can be extrapolated from the torn patterns that it was intended to be displayed in its current, tattered, form.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: You find yourselves in the castle of an ancient, once-prosperous kingdom that has long fallen to ruin.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Now, you must explore every corner of this derelict castle to unveil the true secrets of the old kingdom.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Please note that there are several installations with the explicit purpose of inducing fear. If you have a heart condition, or cannot handle horror very well, please reconsider partaking in this expedition.
So he says.
W-well! V-v-v-v-verily, I have no such fear in my heart! Pah!
Aagh! Don't squeeze me so tightly, Don Quixote!... Can you let go of my arm, please...?

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Hm? Sancho, your grace, if you have something you would like to tell me, please come closer and...

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: I missed a line, you say? What... ah, I see.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Ahm, ahm. Let the fire of courage light your way in this adventure of cold, bone-chilling fear.
The tour must start somewhere around here... Hm. That mirror's gotta be where the Bloodfiends used to hide to shock their guests. And look, that ceiling panel's slightly ajar. That's probably where—

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Keeeeeh! I hate smartasses who can't keep their mouths shut! Stop explaining things!
HEEAAAAGH!!!!!
Bloody hell!
<Huh, she was right...>

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: Don't you understand that the real fun of Haunted: Bloody Mary is walking into a scare knowing that it's going to happen?! Why can't you just be a good guest?!
Sorry, I'm just not that nice.

dataList.title: La Manchaland
dataList.content: We were just going to let you through, but... she's really getting on my nerves!
